channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish being dumped in Alleyway, 30th November
item.description:
Not witnessed, but if you look at number 6 drive. It is the same empty water bottles that have been dumped in black bags in the Alleyway and the foxes have ripped bags apart

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Foots Cray Lane, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ellenborough Road, North Cray, Greater London

item.title: Outrageous amount of Best Turkish Kebab Litter Walford Road, 30th November
item.description:
How many times do we need to report this? The road is absolutely littered with Turkish Kebab takeaway containers and discarded food. We put posters up from the street asking people not to litter and they got torn down & the problem is just getting worse.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road markings on arterial road eastbound near non-existent, 30th November
item.description:
Driving from M25, A282, heading southbound on arterial road, eastbound the road markings at the junction and just beyond our near non-existent. Meaning people often cut lanes because it's impossible to see where the three lanes have their boundaries.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arterial Road West Thurrock, West Thurrock, South Ockendon
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large items, 30th November
item.description:
Care taker from lockington apartments Taking large items left in bin area and putting onto street Which then encourages fly tipping around fire exit to apartments which becomes a hazard.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gallions Road, Charlton

item.title: Abandoned vehicle on the road, 30th November
item.description:
Car has been abandoned on the road on the corner of Beechcroft and Eversley Avenue. It’s causing issues for people turning onto Eversley and those coming down Eversley as well. It’s a black car reg number BU15 AXS, it’s a Vauxhall Astra
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eversley Avenue, North End, Greater London

item.title: 2 more dog poos, 30th November
item.description:
All on Millfields Road. All within 20 yards of my front door. Just getting my children in and out of the house without stepping in excrement is a daily challenge. It’s extremely upsetting

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Millfields Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: 3 new separate dog poos, 30th November
item.description:
Since I reported 2 dog poos on my street (which are still there), there are three new ones. I was not able to upload enough photos to show you them all. As per my previous message, every single day new poos appear. It’s horrible.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Millfields Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged /removed railing causing fly tipping, 30th November
item.description:
Sections of railings around the common been removed/damaged and now flytipping is ongoing next to the stairs/bench. The whole area around Tormount/old mill road needs some urgent attention to fix broken / dangerous railings, uneven pavements, pot holes and damaged street signs etc. Please can something be done to improve this neglected corner of the common, many thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Old Mill Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Datchelor Place Lime bike parked on pedestrian only street, 30th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Datchelor Place, Camberwell, Greater London
